testcase.name: User should complete the Bezahlung
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the url..................................................passed And user clicks on the login icon...........................................passed Given user enters Username for login........................................passed And user enters Password for login..........................................passed And user clicks on SignIn button............................................passed And user clicks on Headphones image.........................................passed And user clicks on Logitech Usb Headset.....................................passed And user clicks black color.................................................passed And user choose the quantity of black color.................................passed And user clicks on Add to Cart button.......................................passed And user choose the yellow color............................................passed And user choose the quantity of yellow color................................passed And user clicks on Add to Cart button.......................................passed And user clicks on the shoppingCartIcon.....................................passed And user clicks on Checkout button..........................................passed And user clicks on Next button to payment method............................passed And user clicks on SafePay button...........................................passed And user does not click on savechanges checkbox button......................passed And user enters SafePay username............................................passed And user enters SafePay password............................................passed And user clicks on PayNow button............................................passed Then user verify the richtige Preis.........................................passed Then user verify the gesamte Preis..........................................passed
